page.title: 14Employment / Farming
page.content: The jobs of the majority of the villagers are Â£professional'. Several people work at the Guardian Royal Exchange Insurance Company in Lytham or others work at British Aerospace in Warton. Other occupations are :- Bank workers, Company directors, Building Society workers Teachers. Others work at British Nuclear Fuels at Salwick. In the area outside the village the most common occupation is farming. There are over 20 farms in this block of which most are arable farms. The smallest farm is 11 acres and has only 2 fields but the largest farm covers over 800 acres. Various crops are grown including barley, wheat, grass, carrots, peas and potatoes. Animals kept on the farms include cows, pigs, sheep, hen and horses.
